scripts.supabase:copy-types: npm run supabase:copy-types:functions:execute-module && npm run supabase:copy-types:functions:fetch-recently-listened && npm run supabase:copy-types:functions:fetch-users-saved-tracks && npm run supabase:copy-types:functions:update-module-schedule && npm run supabase:copy-types:functions:fetch-playlist && npm run supabase:copy-types:functions:get-spotify-token
scripts.supabase:gen-types: npx supabase gen types typescript --schema public,spotify --linked > libs/supabase/types/database.ts && prettier --write "libs/supabase/types/database.ts" && npm run supabase:copy-types
scripts.deploy:functions:execute-module: npx supabase functions deploy execute-module --import-map supabase/functions/import_maps.json
scripts.deploy:functions:fetch-playlist: npx supabase functions deploy fetch-playlist --import-map supabase/functions/import_maps.json
scripts.deploy:functions:get-spotify-token: npx supabase functions deploy get-spotify-token --import-map supabase/functions/import_maps.json
scripts.deploy:functions:fetch-recently-listened: npx supabase functions deploy fetch-recently-listened --import-map supabase/functions/import_maps.json
scripts.deploy:functions:fetch-users-saved-track: npx supabase functions deploy fetch-users-saved-tracks --import-map supabase/functions/import_maps.json
scripts.deploy:functions:update-module-schedule: npx supabase functions deploy update-module-schedule --import-map supabase/functions/import_maps.json
